overview: Educating Oz, is a very rare chapter in Auf Wiedersehen, Pet  history. Mostly unseen by many viewers it stars Jimmy Nail as Oz, and Tim Healy as Dennis, Educating Oz, is a short public information film made in 1986 to highlight the issue of AIDS and how important it is to practice safe sex, using the characters of the popular TV series.
title: Educating Oz
